TopicTitle: [Tutorial] Randez-vous and docking made easy, no mods no hassle [reboot]

Articles.Content:
Since a lot of the content on the forums was wiped I wanted to make sure some of the stuff I added on here was still available for people to see.

Here's a video which includes my method of randez-vous and docking with space stations, it's also a part of my let's play series so there is a bit of footage that may not interest you, the important part is in the beggining though:

http://youtu.be/canqT9KK0T4

Thanks for watching and feel free to leave a comment here on the forums or on youtube if you feel like there's something needs saying.
